title: BRIEF-BDO Unibank Says Closed Offer For Its Issue Of Long-Term Negotiable Certificates Of Deposit
text:
BRIEF-BDO Unibank Says Closed Offer For Its Issue Of Long-Term Negotiable Certificates Of Deposit

Stock Markets 13 minutes ago (Sep 23, 2019 09:20)

BRIEF-BDO Unibank Says Closed Offer For Its Issue Of Long-Term Negotiable Certificates Of Deposit Sept 23 (Reuters) - BDO Unibank Inc :

* CLOSED OFFER FOR ITS ISSUE OF LONG-TERM NEGOTIABLE

CERTIFICATES

OF DEPOSIT ON SEPT 20, SUCCESSFULLY RAISED 6.5 BILLION PESOS

FROM ISSUE



Source text for Eikon: ID:nPSX2tKhlm

Further company coverage: BDO.PS





BRIEF-BDO Unibank Says Closed Offer For Its Issue Of Long-Term Negotiable Certificates Of Deposit
